name: next-intl-hlpr
description: Highlights missing translations in next-intl JSON files and shows missing languages on hover

nextIntlHlpr.detectConfig.description: Whether to automatically detect next-intl configuration from next.config.js/ts and i18n/request.ts

nextIntlHlpr.configPath.description: Path to next-intl configuration files (if not auto-detected). Should point to the directory containing next.config.js/ts and i18n/request.ts

nextIntlHlpr.requestPath.description: Path to the request.ts file (if not in i18n/request.ts). This is where next-intl message loading is configured.
